page.description: Deletes a file in the file system of the mobile device.

argument.name: onComplete
argument.description: A javascript function to call if deleting the file succeeds.

argument.name: onError
argument.description: A javascript function to call if an error occurs when trying to delete the file.

page.discussion: The phoneGapDeleteFile method deletes a file in the file system of the mobile device. The method is asynchronous. Calls the onComplete function if the method succeeded. Calls the onError function is the method failed.
